2015-12-21|2015-12-27.description:
MIND GAMES! The crew of the Lost Light are caught off guard when a dead friend appears out of the blue. But there's no time for a happy reunion: someone else has found his way onto the ship—someone with the power to tear the crew apart.

2015-03-02|2015-03-08.description: Blackgate Prison is in Full Riot! Hush is Loose and in control of the Batcave! Batman's allies are falling one by one! Batman is nowhere to be found! And in the midst of Chaos, Oswald Cobblepot receives an offer he cannot refuse...

2015-03-23|2015-03-29.description: Archie keeps getting a special surprise gift every day: a "snackbox" filled with delicious treats and yummy goodies! The only problem is: he doesn't know who is sending them, and they won't stop coming! Will Archie find out the mystery snack supplier before he's too full to move? Find out in "Snack Attack," the hilarious lead story to this fun comics digest!
2015-03-23|2015-03-29.name: Snack Attack; Yard Sale Season

2015-04-13|2015-04-19.description:
The showdown to end 'em all is finally here! "The Ultimate Betrayal," Part Four: The cataclysmic conclusion! Dr. Light built Gamma to be the definitive answer to all global disasters-unfortunately it looks like all of its power might just be turned against poor Mega Man! As the battle rages, the entire castle stronghold begins to collapse. How will anyone get out of this one alive - and will they at all? Done miss the epic conclusion to this Mega Man 3 game adaptation storyline, featuring new cover art from fan-favorite Brent McCarthy and a special Capcom art variant!

2015-05-25|2015-05-31.description: Batman goes undercover as a deceased convict in order to track down the mastermind behind the Robbery Contest.
2015-05-25|2015-05-31.name: The Robbery Contest! Part 2 of 2

2015-06-01|2015-06-07.description:
TWO DRAGONS, THREE SLAYERS

With her curse magic, Kyoka has deprived Erza of all her senses—except pain, which she has amplified into excruciating torture! But even in these hopeless circumstances, the Fairy Queen continues to counterattack!

Meanwhile, the duels between Igneel and Acnologia and between Natsu and the Underworld King rage on, as dragon father and wizard son struggle to grab onto a sliver of hope! The twin dragons of Sabertooth, Rogue and Sting, show up to help. Can the joint efforts of three dragon slayers force Mard Geer to get serious? The critical moment arrives in the battle between fairies and demons!

In this all-new 2-part story called DEITY, the crew of Starship Enterprise discovers an uncharted world whose inhabitants worship vengeful gods... gods who now turn their wrath on Captain Kirk and his crew!

2015-08-17|2015-08-23.description: After the JLA fends off an alien attack, Superman spends a day seeing how Diana deals with the pressures of being a hero to so many people in so many different ways. And of course, Clark Kent’s exposé “A Day in our Lives” is a big hit for The Daily Planet!
2015-08-17|2015-08-23.name: A Day In Our Lives

2015-09-07|2015-09-13.description: In our first all-Gary issue, SpongeBob's faithful pet snail meows his way through seven slimy stories! First, in "Have a Nice Day, Gary," Gary wriggles his way through calamity, coincidence, and cucumber eye treatments! Then, in "Gary Patty," SpongeBob names a new, experimental patty after Gary-but the snail's new celebrity may have unforeseen consequences. And in "Snail Foot," SpongeBob finally gets to experience life as a mollusk. Plus more gastropod action from Jen Wang, James Kochalka, and Maris Wicks!

2015-10-05|2015-10-11.description:
THE FINAL VOLUME!

After twenty-one years, the final volume of North America’s longest-running manga series is here! They’ve won every test and tribulation that both Heaven and Hell could throw at them; only one challenge now remains for Keiichi and Belldandy—to get back to Earth for their wedding! Even with the help of their friends and family, can they cross the dimensions in time? Spoiler alert: it’s a happy ending!

Inspired the Ah! My Goddess anime TV series, available from Funimation.

Each volume contains fan art, letters, and commentary from the creator.
2015-10-05|2015-10-11.name: Volume 48
